reviewText: I knew that it is hard to film an entire 6 days trials event but DVD main focus is on the special motocross event. If I wanted to see motocross I would have bought another DVD. Really can't recommend this DVD if you are into enduro riding.

This video has been an unexpected surprise. The footage is excellent, the commentary and interviews are intriguing, and the coverage of each race has been some of the best. I'll be looking for the 2010 version when it comes out.
